name: Fat Top View Game V0.1
description:
This is a reworked version of a past project I stopped in the middle of creating so I could play with it a bit.

The experience this game has given me has been instrumental in my future creations!

This game is designed to be a 2D Zelda-like game with  controls to achieve a high score. It is kind of a showcase for the obesity factor in it.

If we were to derive from this work, we might include RPG elements such as towns, events, currency concepts, etc.

Controls

Move Cursor keys

Attack W

Controller Support　(Test version)

We have confirmed that the XBOX controller can be used.

You can assign controls from the F1 key settings, so please experiment with different methods.

Movement Cursor key

Attack B (〇, 2 buttons)
